text: Alle maten (All Sizes) was a 1998 Belgian comedy TV series directed by Rik Daniëls and Vincent Rouffaer written by Frans Ceusters and Paul Coppens. The series had appearances from actors such as Bob Van der Veken who played the character of Aanbidder and Hans de Munter ==External links== * Category:Flemish television shows Category:Belgian comedy television shows Category:1998 Belgian television series debuts Category:1990s Belgian television series
title: Alle maten
